replies.body:
Hey there killer19al,

Whilst Kha'Zix is an assassin, unlike Rengar he doesn't rely on the element of surprise. Thus the point of the reset on Kha'Zix jump. The idea behind Kha'Zix is that upon securing a kill (in spread out team fights) you can use your ult to maneuver to a suitable position and or use your reset on your jump to move onto the next target. 

Regards,
